definition: The Goddess, 1934 silent film about a Shanghai prostitute, directed by 吳永剛|吴永刚[Wu2 Yong3 gang1]
name of a peak by the Three Gorges 長江三峽|长江三峡[Chang2 Jiang1 San1 xia2]
lit. the fairy is willing, but King Xiang doesn't dream (idiom)/(said of a woman's unrequited love)
pinyin: shen2 nu:3 you3 xin1 , Xiang1 Wang2 wu2 meng4

sentences.english: The most marvelous scene here is the twelve mountains peaks and, in particular, Goddess mountain peak.
sentences.chinese: 景色最妙要数巫山十二峰，而犹以神女峰独具神韵。

sentences.english: If not the creation of Luochuan Goddess she is.
When the goddess said that Yang light has attracted the attention of the zhang monarch.
sentences.chinese: 当神女说看出阳明君身上的光引起了张氏的注意。

definition: underground palace of ghouls, e.g. Asgard of Scandinavian mythology
Nichang, abbr. for the Tang Dynasty song "Raiment of Rainbows and Feathers" 霓裳羽衣曲[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 qu1] or 霓裳羽衣舞[Ni2 chang2 yu3 yi1 wu3]
nichang, rainbow colored clothes worn by the Eight Immortals 八仙[Ba1 xian1]
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
Palace in the Moon (in folk tales)
Xi Wangmu, Queen Mother of the West, keeper of the peaches of immortality/popularly known as 王母娘娘
